```{r Selecting all data from Casetrack Table}
myQuery = "SELECT * from `SFDUMMY`;"
dat = dbGetQuery(dbConn, myQuery)
data.frame(dat)

summary(dat)
str(dat)
```


```{r Find Crimes by Keywords}
comments = dat$Comments

type = c("drugs", "stab", "gun")
amount[1] = sum(table(grep("marijuana|pot|narcotics|drug|meth|pills", comments)))
amount[2] = sum(table(grep("stab|knife", comments)))
amount[3] = sum(table(grep("shot|shoot|gun", comments)))

crime.type = data.frame(type, amount)
barplot(crime.type$amount, horiz=TRUE, las=1, xlab="Amount of Crimes")
```

```{r}
## Splitting location into latitude and longitude
dat = dat %>% extract(Location, c("Latitude", "Longitude"), "\\(([^,]+), ([^)]+)\\)")
dat$Longitude <- round(as.numeric(dat$Longitude), 2)
dat$Latitude <- round(as.numeric(dat$Latitude), 2)
```

```{r}
monterey = get_map(location= "monterey county", zoom = 9)
ggmap(monterey)
```


```{r}
## generating heat map
sf = get_map(location= "san francisco", zoom = 13)
ggmap(sf)

locationCrimes = as.data.frame(table(dat$Longitude, dat$Latitude))
names(locationCrimes) = c("long", "lat", "Frequency")
locationCrimes$long = as.numeric(as.character(locationCrimes$long))
locationCrimes$lat = as.numeric(as.character(locationCrimes$lat))

ggmap(sf) + geom_tile(data=locationCrimes, aes(x = long, y = lat, alpha = Frequency),                       fill = "red") + theme(axis.title.y = element_blank(), 
                                            axis.title.x = element_blank())


```
